name: PHVideoRequestOptions
desc: A set of options affecting the delivery of video asset data that you request from an image manager.

items.name: var version: PHVideoRequestOptionsVersion
items.desc: The version of the video to request.

items.name: enum PHVideoRequestOptionsVersion
items.desc: Options for requesting a video asset with or without adjustments, used by the version property.

items.name: var deliveryMode: PHVideoRequestOptionsDeliveryMode
items.desc: A mode specifying the requested video quality and delivery priority.

items.name: enum PHVideoRequestOptionsDeliveryMode
items.desc: Options for delivering requested video data, used by the deliveryMode property.

items.name: var isNetworkAccessAllowed: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that specifies whether Photos can download the requested video from iCloud.

items.name: var progressHandler: PHAssetVideoProgressHandler?
items.desc: A block Photos calls periodically while downloading the video.

items.name: typealias PHAssetVideoProgressHandler
items.desc: The signature for a block that Photos calls while downloading asset data from iCloud. Used by the progressHandler property.
